verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:10
verses.text: But David pursued, he and four hundred men: for two hundred abode behind, which were so faint that they could not go over the brook Besor.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:11
verses.text: And they found an Egyptian in the field, and brought him to David, and gave him bread, and he did eat; and they made him drink water;

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:12
verses.text: And they gave him a piece of a cake of figs, and two clusters of raisins: and when he had eaten, his spirit came again to him: for he had eaten no bread, nor drunk any water, three days and three nights.
